WorkItem.ClosedComment: Completed implementation for configurable serialization and data repositories. Included hard-coded default configuration so consumers may continue to use the API without needing an app.config if desired.
WorkItem.Description:
Make data converters swappable via config and DI to allow for custom stack based processing. This will enable the ability to create upgrade paths as well as publish/read/convert KSP data into any desired format. IE CSV for excel, PDF for a nice report, graphs, nav plotting, 3D systems, etc. 

Changes at this layer should have little to no impact on the consumer API.

Comments.Message: This needs to be completed in this cycle. Analysis shows it may be necessary to further break things down using a Reader pattern.

Serialization pattern re-factored to be closer to other project patterns. Processor and a factory pattern for the processor will handling loading the correct Serializer and Converter based on class metadata and configuration.
